abstract: Michigan State fullback Trevon Pendleton has made number of key contributions to team's success this season, playing key role in some of school's biggest games; is most remembered for 12-yard touchdown reception against Ohio State and outstanding 22-play drive at end of conference championship game against Iowa.
lead_paragraph: Pendleton, a Michigan State fullback whose main role is to block for running backs, has only four receptions this year, but they are among the biggest of the season for the Spartans.

headline.main: Trevon Pendleton Has Body for Big Blocks and Nose for Huge Plays
headline.print_headline: A Body for Big Blocks, a Nose for Huge Plays

snippet: Pendleton, a Michigan State fullback whose main role is to block for running backs, has only four receptions this year, but they are among the biggest of the season for the Spartans.
